scene.name: intro
scene.line: Hey. You're looking kinda tired there, old man. Want me to take the wheel for a bit?
You almost went off the road for a second there. Can I take over?
Yeah, I saw you yawning. Here, let me drive.
We can probably get some coffee around ... never mind. I'll take over if you want?
scene.option: Yeah, maybe that's a good idea.
